description.text:
(Translated from Chinese by AI)
1. Update Terracotta to 0.4.2, fixing the issue where multiplayer was not working.  
2. Fix the issue where the launcher unexpectedly crashed after exporting the world.  
3. Update ANGLE.  
4. Update the KW renderer.  
5. Optimize the launcher's FPS display update mechanism to resolve abnormal CPU usage.

（若启动器内下载缓慢请使用网盘下载,64位的请下载arm64，不知道该下哪个的请下载all）
1.更新Terracotta至0.4.2，修复无法联机的问题
2.修复导出世界完成后启动器意外崩溃的问题
3.更新ANGLE
4.更新KW渲染器
5.优化启动器的FPS显示更新机制，修复CPU异常占用
